name: chlog
description: Self-contained blogging platform as a CouchApp with one-click publishing and a Markdown editor that supports drag and drop images with live preview.

scripts.setup: npm install & npm install --prefix ./admin/_attachments & npm install --prefix ./public/_attachments
scripts.push: npm run pushDist && npm run pushDB
scripts.pushDist: couchapp push dist/admin http://localhost:5984/chlog && couchapp push dist/public http://localhost:5984/chlog
scripts.pushDB: couchapp push database http://localhost:5984/chlog-public && couchapp push database http://localhost:5984/chlog-admin

author: csbrandt
